alert.note: Alert for Bee; Inland San Patricio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 15 at 8:04PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN SAN PATRICIO AND SOUTH CENTRAL BEE COUNTIES THROUGH 830 PM CDT... At 803 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tynan, or near Skidmore, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Skidmore, St. Paul, West Sinton, Papalote, and Tynan. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 26 and 28. US Highway 181 between mile markers 602 and 620. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
